Title: Man works hard, flowers are fragrant
Designer: Li Mubai (李慕白)Jin Xuechen (金雪尘)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: Li Mubai and Jin Xuechen are two of the most famous designers of commercial posters featuring elegant ladies in the 1930s. After 1949, they are recruited to work for the publishing houses of the People's Republic, designing propaganda posters.
